channel.title: Setting the Name Attribute with JS

item.title: Setting the Name Attribute with JS
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

How do I set the ‘name’ attribute on an element with JS?

This is what I have so far:

		tickeritem = document.createElement("div");
		tickeritem.className = "tickeritem";
		tickeritem.style.left = "1000px";

Read full topic
item.source: Setting the Name Attribute with JS
